"Shioji": "You see, there's this rumor going around about an unusual Ore."
"Apparently folks have found some in the area called Outer Mediola: Sector 1."
"I want to get some data on it."
"It's just... For some reason or another, apparently it can't just be collected whenever."
"Some folks say it has something to do with the weather, but nothing's been confirmed."
"You might have to go through a lot of trouble to find it."
"I know it's a lot to ask, but since it's you, I have faith that it'll work out."
